attributes.action: Establish a £100 Road Fund Tax for drivers aged 65 and over
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HM Government to establish a Road Fund tax of £100 for 65+ car owners, as the proposed changes in Road Fund tax will penalise the elderly, many of whom rely on their car, particularly those living in rural areas.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
